title: Data Analyst
subtitle: Hello! I'm Yudhistira Jinawi Agung.
intro: Data Analyst with 1.5+ years experience. Part-time worker at FunneLinkA company that focuses on helping optimize online marketing and customer relationship management for UMKM (Usaha Mikro Kecil dan Menengah).. Former Data Scientist intern at VOCASIAVocasia.id is an online educational marketplace & learning management system platform to share structured expertise and knowledge, and can be used widely for both individuals and communities at an affordable price.. Experienced in Data Pipeline, Data Visualization, and Machine Learning (NLP).
